Uses of Class
com.qequipe.p11.Slot

  • Packages that use Slot 
    Package Description
    com.qequipe.p11  

    • Uses of Slot in com.qequipe.p11

      Methods in com.qequipe.p11 that return Slot 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Slot Token.getSlot()
      Gets the slot where this token is inserted.
      Slot SlotList.getSlot(long slotID)
      Gets the slot with given slot ID
      Slot P11.waitForSlotEvent(int flags)
      Wait for a slot event like smart card insertion or removal WaitForSlotEvent waits for a slot event, such as token insertion or token removal, to occur. flags determines whether or not the WaitForSlotEvent call blocks (i.e., waits for a slot event to occur); At present, the only flag defined for use in the flags argument is CKF_DONT_BLOCK: Internally, each P11 application has a flag for each slot which is used to track whether or not any unrecognized events involving that slot have occurred.
